Name: Octopus - Find CaC Updates (S3 Backend)
Description:
This step queries each workspace in the Terraform state for downstream Octopus CaC enabled projects, extracts the Git repo associated with the CaC project, and determines if there are any changes to merge into the downstream project from the upstream project.

This indicates if changes to an upstream project are available to be merged into a downstream project, either automatically, or after resolving merge conflicts.

Parameters.Name: FindConflicts.Git.Credentials.Username
Parameters.Label: Git Username
Parameters.HelpText: The git repo username. When using GitHub with an access token, the value is `x-access-token`.

Parameters.Name: FindConflicts.Git.Credentials.Password
Parameters.Label: Git Password
Parameters.HelpText: The git repo password or access token.

Parameters.Name: FindConflicts.Git.Url.Organization
Parameters.Label: Git Organization
Parameters.HelpText: The git repo owner or organization i.e. `owner` in the url `https://github.com/owner/repo`.

Parameters.Name: FindConflicts.Git.Url.Template
Parameters.Label: Git Template Repo
Parameters.HelpText: The repo holding the upstream, or template, CaC project i.e. `repo` in the url `https://github.com/owner/repo`.

Parameters.Name: FindConflicts.Terraform.Backend.S3Region
Parameters.Label: AWS Region
Parameters.HelpText: The AWS region hosting the S3 bucket persisting the Terraform state.

Parameters.Name: FindConflicts.Terraform.Backend.S3Key
Parameters.Label: S3 Key
Parameters.HelpText: The name of the file in the S3 bucket hosting the Terraform state.

Parameters.Name: FindConflicts.Terraform.Backend.S3Bucket
Parameters.Label: S3 Bucket
Parameters.HelpText: The name of the S3 bucket hosting the Terraform state.

Parameters.Name: FindConflicts.Terraform.Aws.Account
Parameters.Label: AWS Account
Parameters.HelpText: The AWS account used to access the S3 bucket.
